review: Really cool would like to see more real A level movies in prime
author: Louis O. Zankowski

review: I love this fire stick it's amazing how that small object can have so much information GOOD BYE CABLE
author: reynaldo martinez

review: This device is the most awesome device to own! It eliminate me from using hdmi for my pc but now i could cast my pc video to this little stick. The remote controll is simplistic. And it might even save me on energy bill watching from this stick then my ps3 which consume more power. App are ok, wish they added more app in future. but the amazon fire tv stick is an awesome to my entertainment collection.
author: scrApyArd

review: Works like a charm!  Best investment ever for television interactivity.  Streaming has been great and all the extras that are part of the Fire TV Stick really work to make it a stand-out product.  For the price, you can NOT go wrong.
author: Paul E. Sponaugle

review: Having major difficulty connecting it! Frustrated & unhappy!!!
author: Cindy Reed
